author: eptwts
text:
i like to keep it humble but i'm yet to find anyone who understand the X algo better than me...

but the thing is, there's a tradeoff between authenticity & virality

9 times out of 10, what's required to go viral is extremely cringe normie-coded messaging/formatting

it's the reason you see LARPs get 100's of thousands of impressions while the legit killers in this space don't get many at all
